mapper.select: SELECT a.APPRO_NO, a.APPRO_LINE_NO, a.DOC_FORM_NO, a.EMP_ID, a.APPRO_EMPNAME, a.APPRO_TITLE, a.APPRO_CONTENT, a.APPRO_REGDATE, a.APPRO_STATUS, a.APPRO_STATUS_NO, a.APPRO_TYPE, a.APPRO_REFER, a.APPRO_RETURNREASON, al.APPRO_LINE FROM APPROVAL a JOIN APPROVAL_LINE al ON a.APPRO_LINE_NO = al.APPRO_LINE_NO WHERE a.EMP_ID = #{emp_id} AND APPRO_STATUS_NO =1

SELECT a.APPRO_NO ,a.APPRO_LINE_NO ,ap.EMP_ID , ap.APPRO_STATUS , ap.APPRO_INFO ,TO_NUMBER(ROW_NUMBER) RM FROM APPROVAL_LINE al ,(SELECT APPRO_NO,APPRO_LINE_NO FROM APPROVAL a) a ,JSON_TABLE(APPRO_LINE, '$.approval[*]' COLUMNS( ROW_NUMBER FOR ORDINALITY, EMP_ID VARCHAR2(100) PATH '$.EMP_ID', APPRO_INFO VARCHAR2(100) PATH '$.APPRO_NAME', APPRO_STATUS VARCHAR2(100) PATH '$.APPRO_STATUS')) AS ap WHERE al.APPRO_LINE_NO = a.APPRO_LINE_NO AND ap.EMP_ID = #{emp_id}
